properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 9 at 2:42PM EST until February 10 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6
inches.

* WHERE...Lewis county. The greatest snow amounts will be across
the higher terrain in the southern portion of the county.

* WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on snow covered and slippery road conditions.
The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
properties.instruction:
Periods of snow will result in snow covered roads and limited
visibilities. Slow down and use caution while driving.

Submit snow reports through our website or social media.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST MONDAY
